lines.text: Well, that looks like a pretty heavy candle, there...
Could be the Go Wizard clocked him over the head with it, and he couldn't escape because he was unconscious.
Candles ain't that heavy- and I think you're missin' a key bit of the logistics, here.
The Go Wizard's been shot, right? He couldn't have knocked the shooter out first.
Anything the wizard did with that candle would have to leave the guy conscious.
I bet the candle's <c=#FF00FF>involved in the fire part,</c> but...
